page.title: 11BOTLEIGH GRANGE HOTEL
page.content: The Botleigh Grange Hotel is a magnificent 16th century house which has 25 acres of parkland,gardens and lakes. The Hotel has 50 bedrooms with the majority having a bathroom or shower,a colour television and radio. The Hotel is used for all sorts of business functions. Twin or Double-Bedded rooms cost Â£43.00 per night.This includes Bed and full English Breakfast,Service & VAT. Botleigh Grange has a haunted chamber.A former owner is said to have kept his daughter trapped in her room because she fell in love with a knight.She died of starvation. There is a monument in the grounds to mark the spot of a fatal horse riding accident.The horse was shot and buried on the spot at which the girl fell.
